sentences.en: a ragged child with bare feet
sentences.cn: 一个衣衫褴褛、光着脚的小孩

sentences.en: He bared his back to the hot sun.
sentences.cn: 他露出脊背在炎热的太阳下暴晒。

sentences.en: He got 40% – a bare pass.
sentences.cn: 他得了40分，勉强及格。

sentences.en: He had bare feet, a T-shirt and cords on.
sentences.cn: 他光着脚，穿着T恤衫和灯芯绒裤子。

sentences.en: He led me through to a bare, draughty interviewing room.
sentences.cn: 他把我带到了一间空荡荡的、有过堂风的会见室。

sentences.en: Her bare feet were dirt-streaked and cracked with cold.
sentences.cn: 她赤裸的双脚上满是一道道的泥污，都冻得开裂了。

sentences.en: His bare feet were smooth on top and rough-skinned underneath.
sentences.cn: 他赤裸的双脚脚面很光滑，脚底却很粗糙。

sentences.en: His fridge was bare apart from three very withered tomatoes.
sentences.cn: 他的冰箱里除了3个非常干瘪的西红柿外已经空空如也。

sentences.en: Police believe the killer punched her to death with his bare hands.
sentences.cn: 警方认为她是被凶手活活用拳头打死的。

sentences.en: Rescuers were using their bare hands to reach the trapped miners.
sentences.cn: 救援人员正徒手营救被困矿工。

sentences.en: She felt the sun warm on her bare arms.
sentences.cn: 她感觉到阳光照在她裸露双臂上的暖意。

sentences.en: She looked round her tiny bare room.
sentences.cn: 她环顾她那空荡荡的小房间。

sentences.en: She ran up the stairs, her bare feet thudding on the wood.
sentences.cn: 她光着脚噔噔地跑上木质楼梯。

sentences.en: the bare bones of the plot.
sentences.cn: 情节梗概。

sentences.en: The dog bared its teeth .
sentences.cn: 狗露出了牙齿。

sentences.en: The hills above the valley are bare rock.
sentences.cn: 山谷上方的小山全是光秃秃的石头。

sentences.en: the interior was bare of plaster.
sentences.cn: 内墙没有涂灰泥。

sentences.en: The room remains simple with bare, stippled green walls.
sentences.cn: 房间仍然很简朴，四面都是饰有圆点的绿色空墙。

sentences.en: The room was bare and empty.
sentences.cn: 房间空荡荡的。

sentences.en: The work space is a bare and cavernous warehouse.
sentences.cn: 工作场地是个空荡荡的大仓库。

sentences.en: Their room was bare of furniture and they lived off porridge.
sentences.cn: 他们家徒四壁，靠喝粥度日。

sentences.en: They would have liked bare wooden floors throughout the house.
sentences.cn: 他们本想在整个房间的木地板上都不铺地毯的。

sentences.en: What bare-faced cheek!
sentences.cn: 真是厚颜无耻！

trans.tran_cn: 裸露的，光秃秃的，未加装饰的，空的，最低限度的，勉强的，仅有的，

trans.tran_en: to remove something that was covering or hiding something
to remove something that was covering or hiding something
